definition: to realize clearly/to settle a matter/to get it over with
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
to settle a matter by leaving it unsettled/to end up with nothing definite
being bright at an early age does not necessarily bring success upon growing up (proverb)
pinyin: xiao3 shi2 liao3 liao3 , da4 wei4 bi4 jia1

sentences.chinese: 這項指控後來也不了了之了。

sentences.english: Workload is very arduous, end up with nothing definite later.
sentences.chinese: 工作量是非常艱鉅，後來不了了之。

sentences.english: It's an issue that will not go away, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，這個問題不會不了了之。

sentences.english: The friend hits Mr Zhang thinks when his home plays, end up with nothing definite.
sentences.chinese: 張先生以爲是朋友在他家玩時打的，便不了了之。

sentences.english: A leisurely process of decision - making creates a presumption in favor of eventual inaction.
sentences.chinese: 不慌不忙地作決定就會使人猜測是打算不了了之。

sentences.english: Everyone caught the thieve to the police station.
sentences.chinese: 大家把賊送到警察局，不了了之。

sentences.english: He doesn't know much about the rules of game.
sentences.chinese: 他對股市的遊戲規則不甚了了。

sentences.english: Talks have been in limbo since 2008.
sentences.chinese: 會談自2008年以來就不了了之。

definition: (of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
to do something to sb/to deal with/to cope/how?/to no avail
up until now/so far
hereto/hereunto
to resolve/to settle
to be finished/to be done for/ruined/gone to the dogs/oh no
luckily/fortunately
to stop at this point/to end here/to call it a day
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
just as expected/told you so
variant of 妙[miao4]
it may be assumed that
to drop (subject etc)
already
it is a pity/what a pity/unfortunately
this time
